title: Booger Red and Cowboy
description: It's a modern re-telling of Beauty and the Beast in a post Vietnam, outlaw biker, homoerotic, Master/slave context.It's the story of a young (eighteen year old) champion, rodeocowboy, who falls in love with and agrees to become the slave of a butt ugly, bald, flaming red beard and 'stach, big, burley, outlaw biker, thirty years his senior. It's a story of love, trust, betrayal, forgivness, compassion, loss, faith and hope.
author: Waddie Greywolf
